title: 2 Simple Ways to Change a Netflix Subscription or Membership

steps.title: Go to the Netflix account page on a mobile browser.
steps.content: Go to the Netflix account page on a mobile browser. If you aren't already logged into your account , you'll be prompted to enter your email address and password. While you can't use the Netflix app to change your plan, you can use the website on a mobile browser. You can also go directly to netflix.com/ChangePlan. You can manage your Netflix account from any profile aside from a Kids profile.

steps.title: Tap Manage membership.
steps.content: Tap Manage membership . You can find this below your current plan information. Alternatively, tap the Membership tab at the top.

steps.title: Tap Change plan.
steps.content: Tap Change plan . This is underneath your current plan. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select a new plan.
steps.content: Select a new plan. You should see your current plan with a blue checkmark. Currently, the available plans are: Standard with ads : Full HD (1080p) video with ad breaks and downloads on up to 2 devices at once. This plan does not support account sharing with members outside the household. Standard : Full HD (1080p) video ad-free with downloads on up to 2 devices at once. This plan supports sharing with members outside the household. Premium : Ultra HD (4k) video, HDR, and spatial audio ad-free with downloads on up to 6 devices at once. This plan supports sharing with members outside the household.

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . You may need to scroll down to find this button. It's at the very bottom of the page. If you don't already have a payment method linked to your account, you may be prompted to add one now. A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Tap Confirm.
steps.content: Tap Confirm . Your new plan will begin after your current billing period ends.

steps.title: Go to the Netflix account page.
steps.content: Go to the Netflix account page. If you aren't already logged in, you'll be prompted to enter your email address and password. To get to this section from the Netflix homepage, click your account icon in the top-right corner, and then click Account in the drop-down menu. You can also go directly to netflix.com/ChangePlan. You can manage your Netflix account from any profile aside from a Kids profile.

steps.title: Can I change my Netflix plan on mobile?
steps.content: Can I change my Netflix plan on mobile? While you can cancel your Netflix plan on the mobile app, you must log into the website to change your plan. If you don't have the app, you can log into Netflix using a mobile browser instead.

steps.title: Why can't I change my plan?
steps.content: Why can't I change my plan? If your account is on hold, or if you have a cancellation pending, you may be unable to change your plan. To undo a cancel request, visit your account settings and select the Undo Cancel Request button on the Membership page. If your account is on hold, you'll need to contact Netflix .

steps.title: Can I share my Netflix account with someone else?
steps.content: Can I share my Netflix account with someone else? If you have a Standard or Premium Netflix plan, you can share your account with those outside of your household. However, if you have Standard with ads , you'll be limited to only those in your household.

steps.title: Can Netflix bill me through Apple?
steps.content: Can Netflix bill me through Apple? You can no longer pay for Netflix through Apple. This feature has been removed, though some members in select countries may still have this feature. [4] X Research source
